column4: Is there some way I can go from a running installation to a recovery environment in a ramdisk with all of my actual volumes unmounted?
run a live cd?
unfortunately I don't have physical access - it's a colocated server
what about mounting as read only?
well, the volumes that I want to unmount are my LVM volumes, which I want to unmount so that I can rename them.
but my root partition (including /boot) is on one of the LVM volumes
I don't know what is a LVM volume :/
it's hell... that's what it is
just kidding, it's useful but makes stuff like this impossible it seems
they moved sun java to the partner repos :(
